title: Enerhealth
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy is an art of combining pure essential oils (aroma) with the healing technique of massage; allowing one to relax & delight in the sensual world of aromatherapy. Pure essential oils, often referred to as the 'spirit of the plant' are hand blended by the aromatherapist. The oils are chosen for the client and based on aroma and medicinal uses. This blend will be used in a full body massage.
